title: Roast chicken with lemon and rosemary roast spuds
ingredients: ['2kg chicken (free range)', 'a generous amount of salt and pepper', '2kg potatoes', '1 large lemon (try to get an unwaxed one)', '1 bulb garlic', 'handful fresh thyme', 'olive oil', 'handful fresh rosemary sprigs (leaves picked)', '1 more clove garlic']
